descriptionHTML:
Torch is a simple and convenient application! It was designed to help you in dark time or places. Whether you have a mobile phone or android wear device they will illuminate a place or a thing.

Features:
- Designed for wearable devices such as Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch or Motorola Moto 360
- Designed for mobile phones with or without a LED flash
- It uses your device’s camera flash (LED) as a torch
- If you have no flash it uses your screen with maximum of brightness
- Remotely running application on a wearable device from a phone in some cases can help you to find your device!

Key words: bright torch, light, torch, lighter, android wear, smartwatch, LED.
comments: Cool flashlight Perfect for Samsung Gear Life and for my DROID MAXX
